name: Chuckin Sauce
description:
Chuckin' Sauce allows even the most dusty hockey player to chuck sauce like a pro!

Play multiple levels in multiple worlds, including playing the game the way it was meant to be played... on the pond!

Earn trophies as your chuckin' sauce ability is challenged in a wide array of levels.

Perfect for killing time on a long roadie, prepping before that big game, or waiting for the other teams tendy to show up in men's league.
